en.name: Shimenawa’s Reminiscence
en.4p: When casting an Elemental Skill, if the character has 15 or more Energy, they lose 15 Energy and Normal/Charged/Plunging Attack DMG is increased by 50% for 10s. This effect will not trigger again during that duration.

zh.name: 追忆之注连
zh.4p: 施放元素战技时，如果角色的元素能量高于或等于15点，则会流失15点元素能量，使接下来的10秒内，普通攻击、重击、下落攻击造成的伤害提高50%，持续期间内该效果不会再次触发。
